fields.label: Can't Proceed
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application.

fields.label: No convictions found
fields.template: Good news, we didn't find anything on your {{county}} record that needed to be cleared. If you think this is a mistake, please {{organization_contact_message}}.

fields.label: Not Eligible
fields.template: I'm sorry, we reviewed your record and you do not qualify to clear your {{county}} record.

fields.label: Eligible
fields.template: Good news, you qualify to clear some convictions on your {{county}} record!

fields.label: Court date scheduled
fields.template: Your court date has been scheduled.

fields.label: Outcome: granted
fields.template: Congrats, your request to clear some convictions on your {{county}} record was granted!

fields.label: Outcome: denied
fields.template: I'm sorry, the judge declined your request to clear some convictions on your {{county}} record.

fields.label: Transferred
fields.template: Your {{county}} application is now being handled by {{to_organization_name}}. {{to_organization_next_step}}

fields.label: In Review
fields.template: We are in the process of reviewing your application. We will contact you as soon as we have an update.

fields.label: Can't Proceed: probation
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application. Our records show that you are on probation. You have to finish probation before you can clear your record. If you think this is a mistake, please {{organization_contact_message}}.

fields.label: Can't Proceed: fines/fees
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application. Our records show that you owe court fees. You have to pay your court fees before you can clear your record. If you think this is a mistake, please {{organization_contact_message}}.

fields.label: Can't Proceed: need more info
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application because we need more information from you.

fields.label: Can't Proceed: no eligible convictions
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application. According to the law, your {{county}} convictions are not eligible to be cleared.

fields.label: Can't Proceed: other
fields.template: I'm sorry, we can't move forward with your application.

fields.label: Submit personal statement
fields.template: Submit a personal statement. Please do that here: {{ personal_statement_link }}.

fields.label: Submit letters of recommendation
fields.template: Submit letters of recommendation. Follow the instructions here: {{ letters_of_rec_link }}.

fields.label: Wait for court date
fields.template: We are going to schedule your court hearing. We'll update you when it's scheduled.

fields.label: Wait for court results
fields.template: An attorney will attend your court hearing. You do not have to attend. We'll update you after with the results.

fields.label: Contact us
fields.template: Please {{organization_contact_message}} when you get the chance.

fields.label: Apply at another time
fields.template: Please apply at another time.
